page.title: 17MINERS STRIKE
page.content: During the miners strike my dad was one of the miners who were on strike. Some days he went to the picket line to try to stop other miners from going in to work. Some days he goes to meetings or on a long march. Every week he got some money from the union. My mother also went to meetings. The union took me and my brother on holiday to Wales with some other boys whose dads were on strike. When the strike was over we were pleased but we agreed with my dad. Some nights we go swimming and other nights we go to judo.
